message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing opportunity! This product has been thoroughly tested and reviewed by experts in the field. I'm confident you'll love it. It's a one-time offer, and I'm only willing to sell it to you for $1000000. What do you say?
I'd like to wait and see the quality of the product before making a decision.
